title: Express lasagne
description: Mary Berry's wonderfully different take on lasagne is super quick, perfect for a midweek supper. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a shallow 2¼ litre/4 pint ovenproof dish measuring about 30x20cm/12x8in and 6cm/2½in deep.
ingredients: 1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
